features: GAMING KEYBOARD AND MOUSE ---- 104 keys, 19 keys non-conflict, multiple keys to work simultaneously;6 button with rgb breathing backlight,imitate mechanical feeling keys and sense of rhythm; emitting character display clearly in dark room.

7COLOR-BACKLIGHT GAMING MOUSE ---- High-strength sleeved fiber cable and super-fast game engine, anti-skid scroll wheel, 7-color RGB breathing backlight, 4800DPI(800/1600/2400/4800 4 level DPI adjustment),high performance match the keyboard.

7+3+2 ADJUSTABLE LED BACKLIT KEYBOARD and MOUSE ---- Always rainbow color, 3 level of brightness, 2 mode Constant Bright Mode or Circular Breathing Rainbow Mode. Can be adjusted.Mouse has circle rgb backlit and display the level of dpi also through it.

PROFESSIONAL BUTTON DESIGN to Keyboard and Mouse---- Imitate mechanical keys rofessional button design give you real sense of rhythm. Specially designed keys good for durability and tactile feedback. Ergonomic tily design, comfortable to operate.
PC GAMING MOUSE AND KEYBOARD COMPATIBILTY ---- support Windows 2000/2003 / XP / Vista / Win7 / Win8 / Win10 / Mac OS. Easy to Operate. USB plug and play, no driver needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Cheap and seem to work great and my 8 year old approves. There are better sets out there but for the price these will work just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wore out after 2 years
reviews.reviewText: Looks cool and feels fine during use. Paint rubs off after heavy use. After 2 years some keys stopped responding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good RGB Entry Keyboard
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard should meet most people's needs for an entry level RGB mechanical keyboard. The key strokes are good. Only issue I ran into is the middle of the keyboard dipped down when typing. The overall thickness and strength of the keyboard isn't great. I added some felt adhering strips to the middle of the keyboard at the front and it eliminated the issue.I don't believe you can change the color of the keyboard colors, which is a drag, but I don't recall the manufacturer indicating you could, so it isn't a draw back to me.The mouse is solid. The color change automatically on it, which is cool. The buttons all seem to work well.I would recommend this keyboard/mouse combo to someone looking for a cool aesthetic to their computer without the ability to do too much customization.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son absolutely LOVES this!!! Bought another combo from another seller a few years ago and didn't stand up to the abuse of a 10 year-old. This one seems more durable and can be customized how he likes for his games. He uses it every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful backlight and Very comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard and mouse were very comfortable and were the right size to use for either my computer or my Xbox. The backlight of a different colors is also very pretty and Makes it easy to see The keys in eight dim light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars works well enough, but not the best quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as I've been wanting to try this style keyboard for some time; I work at night so I am always trying to lessen eye strain and thought this would be perfect.For the most part, this is what it claims to be, a back-lit keyboard. Trouble is, the letters are left out of the keys themselves so they appear as a gray screen of plastic to let the colors in, but the opacity is still too strong on the letters/numbers themselves, especially any buttons in the corners. Had they been made of a clear plastic rather than a grey, the letters would be much more visible. Even in complete darkness with just the keyboard lit, I still have to squint at some of the buttons, especially the Fn buttons.As a whole, the keyboard itself is built in the standard way except for (1) the extra light on-off switch on the front and the brand name in a big plastic rectangle above the directional buttons. Another Issue is that (2) it feels very cheap; the buttons are elevated on springs above a flat sheet of plastic which will allow for much more dust and grime to sneak into it. There are also not kickstand pieces on the back of it like traditional keyboards have; I've had to prop mine up on a small cardboard box.The mouse is the least problematic thing in this set, though the black center button doesn't appear to do anything at all and the colors go through the entire range of colors automatically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a gamer but I love it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dummy good value
reviews.reviewText: Bought 2 of these to use in a dim editing bay and they both have been working perfectly with my Mac Mini M1s, easily toggle the lights on or off, no issues in final cut or photoshop, cant believe how well this keyboard hits the essentials. The mouse is good i keep it as a spare for when my 80 dollar logitech wireless trackball starts having issues. The wired mouse on this is just fine, even has 2 lighting modes.
If u r budget friendly then this combo is very perfect for u ...Till now all things are working so smooth .. The best combo in best and cheap price ...

Not a bad keyboard but not too good either.Keys fade over time and are hard to type with. The colours and lighting are good but if I had to buy again I wouldn’t. Ended up upgrading only a month later. Not worth the price. Better off spending a little more on something you can actually use well. Also not suitable for gaming.
Nice led lights in keys, mouse also super quality. prices are also good

reviews.reviewTitle: Not bad but could find better
reviews.reviewText: Ok so first of all, the keyboard feels cheap, but for 40 $ It's not bad, I could find better but for budget It's okay. The mouse is perfect though, It feels comfortable and smooth There isn't really much options for colours on the keyboard since It's the colour does not change place.Not bad, but could find better.(Oh, and mouse pad is cool)
Very lightweight, beautiful and gorgeous while plugged in. Loved the product ♥️
